languages.text: Надевший шлем Матери-паучихи слышал и запомнил шепот каждого, кто надевал его и вставал во главе Кровавой паутины.

traits.locale_text: Надевший шлем пряхи-основательницы никогда не перестанет слышать шепотов усопших, отправленных по другую сторону.

languages.text: The Matriarch Spider's helmet has heard and remembered the whispers of every Bloodspun Web leader who has worn it.
languages.original_text: Надевший шлем Матери-паучихи слышал и запомнил шепот каждого, кто надевал его и вставал во главе Кровавой паутины.

traits.locale_text: The Founder of the Weave's helmet has heard and remembered the whispers of every leader of the Bloodspun Web who wore it.

languages.text: Le heaume de l'araignée matriarche a entendu et se rappelle tous les murmures de tous les dirigeants de la Toile de Sang qui l'ont porté.
languages.original_text: The Matriarch Spider's helmet has heard and remembered the whispers of every Bloodspun Web leader who has worn it.

traits.locale_text: Le heaume de l'araignée matriarche a entendu et se rappelle tous les murmures de tous les dirigeants de la Toile de Sang qui l'ont porté.

languages.text: El yelmo de la Araña Matriarca escucha y recuerda los susurros de todos los líderes de la Red Sanguinolenta que lo han portado.
languages.original_text: The Matriarch Spider's helmet has heard and remembered the whispers of every Bloodspun Web leader who has worn it.

traits.locale_text: El yelmo de la Araña Matriarca escucha y recuerda los susurros de todos los líderes de la Red Sanguinolenta que lo han portado.

languages.text: 女王蜘蛛の兜は、それをかぶったすべてのブラッドスパン・ウェブの指導者達の囁きを聞き、それを記憶している。
languages.original_text: The Matriarch Spider's helmet has heard and remembered the whispers of every Bloodspun Web leader who has worn it.

traits.locale_text: 女王蜘蛛の兜は、それをかぶったすべてのブラッドスパン・ウェブの指導者達の囁きを聞き、それを記憶している。

languages.text: 蛛母族长的头盔，聆听、铭记了织血罗网历任领袖的低语。
languages.original_text: The Matriarch Spider's helmet has heard and remembered the whispers of every Bloodspun Web leader who has worn it.

traits.locale_text: 蛛母族长的头盔，聆听、铭记了织血罗网历任领袖的低语。

languages.text: Der Helm der Spinnenmatriarchin hat das flüstern sämtlicher Anführer des Blutgesponnenen Netzes gehört und sich alle gemerkt, die ihn je getragen haben.
languages.original_text: The Matriarch Spider's helmet has heard and remembered the whispers of every Bloodspun Web leader who has worn it.

traits.locale_text: Der Helm der Spinnenmatriarchin hat das flüstern sämtlicher Anführer des Blutgesponnenen Netzes gehört und sich alle gemerkt, die ihn je getragen haben.

languages.text: Örümcek Kraliçe'nin miğferi, kendisini kuşanan her bir Kanipi Ağı liderinin fısıltılarını işitip hafızasına kazımış.
languages.original_text: The Matriarch Spider's helmet has heard and remembered the whispers of every Bloodspun Web leader who has worn it.
